StarIndex.indexDescription: The hg38 genome without  alternative contigs (but with contigs) was indexed with STAR version  2.5.2b [[REF:STAR]].  The genome was indexed with  level 1 and 2 genes from GENCODE [[REF:GENCODE HUMAN]] v26 for splice junction determination.  The sjdbOverhang parameter was set at 100.  Each sample was aligned to the indexed reference genome using STAR.
StarIndex.notes: bsub -q compbio_priority -P RNA_SEQ_5465 -R "rusage[mem=48000]" -oo logs/indexGTF.stdout -eo logs/indexGTF.stderr  $STARBIN --genomeDir HG38_gencode26   --runMode genomeGenerate --runThreadN 8 --genomeFastaFiles /nfs_exports/genomes/1/Homo_sapiens/GRCh38_no_alt/FASTA/GRCh38_no_alt.fa  --sjdbGTFfile gencode.v26.chr_patch_hapl_scaff.annotation.gtf  --sjdbOverhang 100

Annotations.annotationDescription: GENCODE v25lift37 annotation with only level 1 and 2 genes.
Annotations.notes: grep  -v '; level 3;' gencode.v25lift37.annotation.gtf > gencode.v25lift37.annotation.noLevel3.gtf  (was retrieved from ftp://ftp.sanger.ac.uk/pub/gencode/Gencode_human/release_25/GRCh37_mapping/. )

StarIndex.indexDescription: The hg19 genome without random or alternative contigs was indexed with STAR version  2.5.2b [[REF:STAR]].  The genome was indexed with  level 1 and 2 genes from GENCODE [[REF:GENCODE HUMAN]] v25lift37 for splice junction determination.  The sjdbOverhang parameter was set at 100.  Each sample was aligned to the indexed reference genome using STAR.
StarIndex.notes: bsub -q compbio_priority -P RNA_SEQ_5465 -R "rusage[mem=48000]" -oo logs/indexGTF.stdout -eo logs/indexGTF.stderr  $STARBIN --genomeDir HG19_v25lift37  --runMode genomeGenerate --runThreadN 8 --genomeFastaFiles Hg19.fa  --sjdbGTFfile gencode.v25lift37.annotation.noLevel3.gtf  --sjdbOverhang 100

Annotations.annotationDescription: GENCODE v25lift37 annotation with only level 1 and 2 genes.
Annotations.notes: grep  -v '; level 3;' gencode.v25lift37.annotation.gtf > gencode.v25lift37.annotation.noLevel3.gtf  (was retrieved from ftp://ftp.sanger.ac.uk/pub/gencode/Gencode_human/release_25/GRCh37_mapping/. )

StarIndex.indexDescription: The hg19 genome without random or alternative contigs plus ERCC92 FASTA was indexed with STAR version  2.5.2b [[REF:STAR]].  The genome was indexed with  level 1 and 2 genes from GENCODE [[REF:GENCODE HUMAN]] v25lift37 for splice junction determination.  The sjdbOverhang parameter was set at 100.  Each sample was aligned to the indexed reference genome using STAR.
StarIndex.notes: bsub -q compbio_priority -P RNA_SEQ_5465 -R "rusage[mem=48000]" -oo logs/indexGTF.stdout -eo logs/indexGTF.stderr  "STAR --genomeDir HG19_ERCC92_v25lift37  --runMode genomeGenerate --runThreadN 8 --genomeFastaFiles hg19_ercc92.fa  --sjdbGTFfile gencode.v25lift37.annotation.noLevel3.plusERCC92.gtf  --sjdbOverhang 100"

Annotations.annotationDescription: GENCODE v25lift37 annotation with only level 1 and 2 genes.
Annotations.notes: grep  -v '; level 3;' gencode.v25lift37.annotation.gtf > gencode.v25lift37.annotation.noLevel3.gtf  (was retrieved from ftp://ftp.sanger.ac.uk/pub/gencode/Gencode_human/release_25/GRCh37_mapping/. )  ERCC92 GTF added

StarIndex.indexDescription: The hg19 genome without random or alternative contigs was indexed with STAR version 2.5.2b [[REF:STAR]].  The genome was indexed with  level 1 and 2 genes from GENCODE [[REF:GENCODE HUMAN]] v25lift37 for splice junction determination at the time of alignment.   Each sample was aligned to the indexed reference genome using STAR. The sjdbOverhang parameter was set at 100.

Annotations.annotationDescription: GENCODE v25lift37 annotation with only level 1 and 2 genes from Chromosome 1.

StarIndex.indexDescription: The chromosome 8 fasta file from hg19 reference genome was indexed with STAR version 2.5.2b [[REF:STAR]]. Each sample was aligned to the indexed reference genome using STAR.  Gene level 1 and 2 gene annotations from GENCODE [[REF:GENCODE HUMAN]] v25lift37 was used in the alignment for splice junction determination.  The sjdbOverhang parameter was set at 100.

Annotations.annotationDescription: GENCODE v25lift37 annotation with only level 1 and 2 genes from Chromosome 8.

StarIndex.indexDescription: The mm9 genome without random or alternative contigs was indexed with STAR version 2.5.3a [[REF:STAR]]. Each sample was aligned to the indexed reference genome using STAR.   GENCODE version M1 [[REF:GENCODE MOUSE]]  The sjdbOverhang parameter was set at 100.

Annotations.annotationDescription: The mouse Gencode version M1 GTF annotation file was used for defining genes. (https://www.gencodegenes.org/mouse_releases/1.html) .

StarIndex.indexDescription: The mm9 genome without random or alternative contigs was indexed with STAR version 2.5.2b [[REF:STAR]]. Each sample was aligned to the indexed reference genome using STAR.   GENCODE version M1 [[REF:GENCODE MOUSE]] with only level 1 and 2 genes was used to aid in splice junction determination.  The sjdbOverhang parameter was set at 100.
StarIndex.notes: bsub -q compbio_priority -P RNA_SEQ_5465 -J mm9 -R "rusage[mem=48000]" -oo logs/indexGTF.stdout -eo logs/indexGTF.stderr  $STARBIN --genomeDir MM9_gencodeM1  --runMode genomeGenerate --runThreadN 8 --genomeFastaFiles mm9.fa  --sjdbGTFfile gencode.vM1.annotation.noLevel3.gtf  --sjdbOverhang 100

Annotations.annotationDescription: The mouse Gencode version M1 GTF annotation file was used for defining genes. (https://www.gencodegenes.org/mouse_releases/1.html) . Only level 1+2 genes used.

StarIndex.indexDescription: The mm10 genome without random or alternative contigs was indexed with STAR version 2.5.2b [[REF:STAR]].  The genome was indexed with  level 1 and 2 genes from GENCODE [[REF:GENCODE HUMAN]] version M11 for splice junction determination.  The sjdbOverhang parameter was set at 100.  Each sample was aligned to the indexed reference genome using STAR.
StarIndex.notes: bsub -q compbio_priority -P RNA_SEQ_5465 -J MM10 -R "rusage[mem=48000]" -oo logs/indexGTF.stdout -eo logs/indexGTF.stderr  $STARBIN --genomeDir MM10_gencodeM11  --runMode genomeGenerate --runThreadN 8  --genomeFastaFiles /nfs_exports/genomes/1/Mus_musculus/mm10/FASTA/mm10.fa   --sjdbGTFfile  gencode.vM11.annotation.noLevel3.gtf  --sjdbOverhang 100

Annotations.annotationDescription: The mouse Gencode M11 GTF annotation file was used for defining genes. (https://www.gencodegenes.org/mouse_releases/1.html)

StarIndex.notes: bsub -J BDGPr5NOINDEX -P RNA_SEQ_5465 -q compbio_priority   -R "span[hosts=1] rusage[mem=48000]" -eo  ~/logs/BDGPr5.stderr  -oo ~/logs/BDGPr5.stdout  "$STARBIN  --genomeDir /home/lpalmer1/genomes/Drosophila/BDGPr5/STAR_BDGPr5   --runMode genomeGenerate --genomeFastaFiles  /nfs_exports/genomes/1/Drosophila_melanogaster/BDGPr5/FASTA/BDGPr5.fa"
StarIndex.indexDescription: The BDGPr5 fly reference genome (http://www.fruitfly.org/) was indexed with STAR version 2.5.2b [[REF:STAR]]. Each sample was aligned to the indexed reference genome using STAR.   PDGPr5 annotions (Drosophila_melanogaster.BDGP5.75.gtf.gz) retrieved from http://ftp.ensembl.org/pub/release-75/gtf/drosophila_melanogaster/ was used in the alignment to aid in splice junction determination.  The sjdbOverhang parameter was set at 100.

StarIndex.notes: bsub -q compbio_priority -P RNA_SEQ_5465 -R "rusage[mem=32000]" -oo logs/index.stdout -eo logs/index.stderr  $STARBIN --genomeDir BDGPr6_STAR --runMode genomeGenerate --runThreadN 8 --genomeFastaFiles Drosophila_melanogaster.BDGP6.dna.toplevel.fa
StarIndex.indexDescription: The BDGPr6 fly reference genome (http://www.fruitfly.org/) was indexed with STAR version 2.5.2b [[REF:STAR]]. Each sample was aligned to the indexed reference genome using STAR.   PDGPr6 annotions (ftp://ftp.ensembl.org/pub/release-86/gtf/drosophila_melanogaster/Drosophila_melanogaster.BDGP6.86.gtf.gz) was used in the alignment to aid in splice junction determination.  The sjdbOverhang parameter was set at 100.

Notes.Directory: Make sure to make directory for STAR output
